perturbation.original_text: 5.4.1.2.2. The remaining balance is due net 30 days after delivery by Accuray at the specified F.C.A. location  pursuant to Section 4.1.2 and receipt by Distributor of a reasonably undisputed invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4.1.2.2. The remaining balance is due net 60 days after delivery by Accuray at the specified F.C.A. location  pursuant to Section 4.1.2 and receipt by Distributor of a reasonably undisputed invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the payment deadline from 30 days to 60 days. This creates uncertainty about which deadline should be enforced, potentially leading to disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text: 5.4.2. Products, Spare Parts and Upgrade Payments. Full payment of the purchase price for Products (other than Systems), Spare  Parts and upgrades shall be made by Distributor to Accuray in US Dollars by wire transfer to a bank selected by Accuray  and is due net 30 days after delivery by Accuray at the specified F.C.A. location pursuant to Section 4.1.2 and receipt by  Distributor of a reasonably undisputed invoice. Accuray shall bear the cost of any commission charge for a wire transfer.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4.2. Products, Spare Parts and Upgrade Payments. Full payment of the purchase price for Products (other than Systems), Spare  Parts and upgrades shall be made by Distributor to Accuray in US Dollars by wire transfer to a bank selected by Accuray  and is due net 45 days after delivery by Accuray at the specified F.C.A. location pursuant to Section 4.1.2 and receipt by  Distributor of a reasonably undisputed invoice. Accuray shall bear the cost of any commission charge for a wire transfer.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the payment terms for products, spare parts and upgrades to 'net 45 days' after delivery and invoice receipt, which contradicts the 'net 30 days' mentioned earlier in Section 5.4.1.2.2, and creates ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text: Past due balances on any reasonably  undisputed amount shall bear interest at the rate of 0.5% per month or, if lower, the maximum amount permitted by  applicable law.
perturbation.changed_text: Past due balances on any reasonably  undisputed amount shall bear interest at the rate of 1.0% per month or, if lower, the maximum amount permitted by  applicable law.
perturbation.explanation: This adjustment modifies the interest rate on past due balances from 0.5% to 1.0% per month. This directly conflicts with the originally stated interest rate, thus creating an in-text contradiction. This would create uncertainty about which interest rate to apply to late payments.
